title: Carbon Moto Gear Motorcycle Helmet Cover Sleeves
features: MAKE PEOPLE LAUGH: There's no reason to keep all the fun of riding a motorcycle to ourselves. Now, you don't need to. With this helmet cover, other drivers and passengers can enjoy the fact that you're riding just as much as you're enjoying it. Brighten people's day with this simple, but hilarious, accessory!

GRAB ATTENTION: Riding a motorcycle is always one of the more worrisome modes of transportation for one main reason: visibility. Now, with an attention-grabbing motorcycle helmet cover, you'll stand out and be seen. You can try loud pipes, you can try bright colors, but nothing stands out quite like a funny motorcycle helmet cover.
UNIVERSAL FIT: Our helmet covers are designed to fit MOST full face motorcycle helmets. This means you can change it to your other helmets or even let a friend borrow it!
EASY INSTALL: Install is extremely easy. Simply pull the helmet cover over your helmet, make sure the "mouth" of your character is in the visor space, and you're ready to ride!
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Unhappy with your product? Something not quite right about it? Let us know, and we'll make sure you're taken care of.
